attributes.action: Introduce flashing amber traffic lights with "Give Way" markings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In many European countries, traffic lights are switched to flashing amber during the night time.  Motorists are then required to abide by road markings which establish who has to give way.  Flashing amber reduces CO2 emissions, improves traffic flow and reduces driver frustration.

CO2 Reduction:  
Flashing amber uses less than half the electricity of standard traffic lights.  
Vehicles do not unnecessarily sit in a queue when there is no traffic coming "the other way".  Vehicles progressing down the main route do not have to stop.

Improved traffic flow:  
Vehicles can proceed when the road is clear, allowing better road use.
Unnecessary queues are eliminated.

Reduced Driver Frustration:  
Drivers will no longer have to sit waiting at lights when the road is clear.
Control is handed back to the driver, which will give a better sense of wellbeing.
